title: Edit Job Description using Enhanced JD Feature

steps.value: 2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience

expected_result: Complete job description is generated and displayed

title: Choose Relevant Skills from AI Suggestions
Create Interview and Generate Public Interview Link
expected_result: Unique public interview link is generated and displayed

title: Verify Candidate's Interview Score and Communication Score
steps: Find the candidate who has completed a video interview
Verify the interview score and communication score are displayed
expected_result: Interview score and communication score are correctly displayed

title: Verify AI Summary of the Interview
steps: Find the candidate who has completed a video interview
Verify the AI summary is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: AI summary is correctly displayed with observations, positives, and negatives

title: Verify Action Button to Select or Reject Candidate
steps: Find the candidate who has completed a video interview
Verify the action button to select or reject the candidate is displayed
expected_result: Action button to select or reject the candidate is correctly displayed

title: Verify Ré Screening Process
steps: Create an interview and upload multiple résumés
Verify the AI commences the screening process
Verify the system conducts a comprehensive semantic analysis and assigns a ré score
expected_result: Ré screening process is correctly initiated and ré score is assigned

title: Verify AI Recommendation for Ré Screening
steps: Verify the AI recommendation is displayed for each candidate
Verify the recommendation considers the suitability of the resume and job requirements
expected_result: AI recommendation is correctly displayed and considers resume suitability and job requirements

title: Verify Sending Interview Link to Candidates
steps: Decide to proceed with a candidate
Verify the option to send an interview link to the candidate is available
Verify the interview link is valid for 24 hours
expected_result: Interview link is correctly sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours
